subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: McNeese State Coach Matt Viator said he had met with the former Louisiana State all-American Tyrann Mathieu, who has not decided if he will transfer there after L.S.U. dropped him from its team.
snippet: McNeese State Coach Matt Viator said he had met with the former Louisiana State all-American Tyrann Mathieu, who has not decided if he will transfer there after L.S.U. dropped him from its team.
